column4: Hi, I'm using eeebuntu and would like to scp/putty into that machine, but always get an network error. Any ideas ?
it sounds like you need to read an ssh server tutorial
: : my only linux experience is IPCOP, and on that one I didn't have to do anythinh to use it
if you're so new, why do you want to use ssh?
: : because I want to transfer packages (scp) and install them on the box (putty)
